ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Package_external_reference is an unambiguous reference to the definition of a in an external system.
Package_external_reference is included to permit references to withouth requiring that a geometric representation be present for the terminal.
the product_definition_id specifies one role of a string for the Package_external_reference. The product_definition_id represents the identification of the definition of the being referenced.

the revision_code specifies one role of a string for the Package_external_reference. The revision_code represents a version of the package, and together with part_number is unique within the organization for packages.
the part_number specifies one role of a string for the Package_external_reference. The part_number represents an identifier unique within the organization for packages.
the design_owner specifies one role of a string for the Package_external_reference. The design_owner controls the assignment of part_number for the being referenced.

A Package_terminal_external_reference is an unambiguous reference to a in an external system.
Items in a may need to reference terminals in a library without duplicating the geometric context.
the name specifies the role of a string for the Package_terminal_external_reference. The name shall be interpreted as the name attribute inherited by from .
the associated_definition specifies the role for a for the Package_terminal_external_reference.

A Part_terminal_external_reference is an unambiguous reference to a or to a terminal associated with a type of in an external system. A Part_terminal_external_reference specifies the type of the terminal as well as the identification for the terminal.
Items in a design definition may need to reference terminals in a library without duplicating the geometric context, and may need to specify terminal types by reference instead of explicit instantiation.

the feature_type specifies the string that identifies the type of the terminal referenced for the Part_terminal_external_reference. The interpretation of this string by a receiving system shall be in accordance with the interpretation of .
the feature_name specifies the role of a string as identification for the Part_terminal_external_reference.
the associated_definition specifies the role of either a or a for the Part_terminal_external_reference.
